billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

title: Provides an income tax credit for three years to a taxpayer who purchases a new primary residence for one million dollars or less
summary: Provides an income tax credit for three years to a taxpayer who purchases a new primary residence for one million dollars or less.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to providing a personal income tax credit for the purchase of a new home
